One of the best things I ever started to do was averaging into a position.  An example (if you were shorting $BTC) would be:    5% @ $6,500 15% @ $6,550 20% @ $6,600 30% @ $6,650 30% @ $6,700  Weighted average = $6,635  Best way to mitigate FOMO and risk at the same time.
